content: As you reach an open part of the cave, you’ll have to face one more assassin along the darkened path, and you may notice they’ll go out of their way to destroy the torches along the path to further envelop them in darkness. If you have trouble facing them, always try to bring them to a brighter spot.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind Cave'.
The content is as follows:
As you reach an open part of the cave, you’ll have to face one more assassin along the darkened path, and you may notice they’ll go out of their way to destroy the torches along the path to further envelop them in darkness. If you have trouble facing them, always try to bring them to a brighter spot.
